name: fullstack-open-2023-tsoiffer-part3
description: Resolucion de ejercicios de la parte 3 de Fullstack Open

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack-open/part2/phoneguide && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../Fullstack-Open-2023-tsoiffer-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
